labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.system_settings: Win10 Latest Canary (No I didn't use BetterDiscord for this bug)
data.actual_result: The user will still be able to see the channel contents, read new messages but not reply to anything. As soon as they click out of the channel, it'll vanish.
data.expected_result: The channel will vanish and the user currently viewing something they don't have access to will be sent to the default channel.
data.short_description: Removing permissions while in a hidden channel still allows messages to be seen.
data.steps_to_repro: - Have 2 different accounts using Canary and any other platform - Give the canary account access to manage channels - give the canary account a role that grants access to a hidden channel, then on the canary account, open the channel and leave it open. - Remove the canary accounts role that granted the secret channel but keep the manage channels permission.
